name: Bia's Dream
description:
"In this game, Bia is facing a nightmare to help her confront her fears. It's a game of self discovering."

This is our first game developed for Global Game Jam 2019.
Audio made in Ableton Live 10. Some sprites made in Adobe Fireworks.
Some artworks are free and we take it from various websites.

Arrow Keys to move left, right and in the elevator
Z to atack
Enter to choose an option in main menu

Developed by

Rodrigo Faleiros
Peterson Santos
Alexandre Real
